definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]
to flatten/to level/to raze to the ground
(neologism) (coll.) pet owner (lit. "official in charge of cleaning up poop")

sentences.english: You may dig a hole with a spade over there.
sentences.chinese: 你可以用鏟正在正在邊撅個坑。

sentences.english: I'll get you home tomorrow if I have to shovel the whole road.
sentences.chinese: 明天就算鏟完整條路上的雪，我也一定要把你送到家。

sentences.english: Papa would bring an old battered coal shovel and an old-fashioned ice chest with him.
sentences.chinese: 爺爺總會帶來一把破舊的煤鏟和一臺老式冰櫃。

sentences.english: Taking the garbage out and keeping the sidewalk shoveled.
sentences.chinese: 垃圾倒掉，人行道上的積雪鏟走。

sentences.english: I was tired after shoveling snow all day.
sentences.chinese: 鏟了一天的雪我很累了。

sentences.english: Yun-kun, I guess I've never thought of coins being the shape of a knife or a spade.
sentences.chinese: 我從來沒有想象到錢幣會有刀形和鏟形的。

sentences.english: The engineer shoveled the coal in as fast as he could.
sentences.chinese: 那個工程師儘快地把煤鏟進去。

sentences.english: They also converted into the different types of snow removal vehicles, cars.
sentences.chinese: 他們也把各類車輛改裝成鏟雪車使用。

sentences.english: A new type of optimum cutting and throwing soil component combining reverse rotational rotor with the blade with open type bulldozer blade was developed.
sentences.chinese: 該文研製了逆轉刀輥與開式推土鏟組合的切拋土部件。

sentences.english: Use trash cans to store shovels, hoes and rakes.
sentences.chinese: 使用垃圾桶來存儲鏟，鋤頭和耙。

sentences.english: A few shovel loads later, the farmer looked down the well, and was astonished at what he saw.
sentences.chinese: 又鏟了幾下土之後，農夫看了看井底，大喫一驚。

sentences.english: Luo Fu laid a foundation for the Luo Fu Cultural Square together with leaders presented.
sentences.chinese: 洛夫和與會領導一起揮鏟培土，爲洛夫文化廣場奠基。

sentences.english: She levelled the surface of the cake mixture with a metal spatula.
sentences.chinese: 她用金屬鏟抹平了蛋糕配料。

sentences.english: The same trowel rests in my hand now, though the handle has loosened over the years.
sentences.chinese: 那把泥鏟現在就在我的手上，儘管許多年來把柄鬆了。

sentences.english: Mechanical excavation is carried out by a variety of machines, including the shovel and drag- line excavator.
sentences.chinese: 機械挖掘採用多種工具，如鐵鏟和索鏟挖土機。

sentences.english: A cavity opening shovel is provided with a water discharge valve controlled by a control mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 開穴鏟上設有一個放水閥，並由一個操縱機構控制。

definition: pad/cushion/mat/to pad out/to fill a gap/to pay for sb/to advance (money)
cat/CL:隻|只[zhi1]/(dialect) to hide oneself/(coll.) modem
foot/leg (of an animal or an object)/base (of an object)/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]/classifier for kicks
to burn/to cook/to stew/to bake/to roast/to heat/to boil (tea, water etc)/fever/to run a temperature/(coll.) to let things go to one's head
see 鍋|锅[guo1]/see 涮鍋子|涮锅子[shuan4 guo1 zi5]/bowl (of a smoking pipe etc)
nail/to follow closely/to keep at sb (to do sth)/variant of 盯[ding1]
to join things together by fixing them in place at one or more points/to nail/to pin/to staple/to sew on
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
